title: YEAR 11 QLD
body: probs not the best place to ask, but since the league fan base is around the high school age, i would like to ask that does Year 11 count towards your O.P? I'm in QLD, thanks

replies.body: AFAIK its only your final grades in Y12 compared to your year, and the other schools that count towards your OP. I live in QLD but I did the IB so I'm not too sure how the end game of the OP system works. Best bet is to ask one of your teachers, but they should tell you what assignments/tests will count towards it next year.
